quote: God gave me some weird, beautiful scent that makes men and women go crazy. People compare it to Carvel. It is a whale of a smell.

quote: It's the kind of clothes that mothers and daughters can wear, in terms of concept... It's not about age. It's about taste, and it's about lifestyle. I believe women of all ages can wear anything.

quote: Women are so unforgiving of themselves. We don't recognize our own beauty because we're too busy comparing ourselves to other people.
name: Kelly Osbourne

quote: When I do get pregnant, I highly doubt I'll be one of those women who don't look pregnant from behind - I'll be that chick who looks pregnant from her ankles up!

quote: We women are constantly at war with our bodies, it is hard to find amnesty for ourselves.

quote: Because all of us believe and understand in the fabric of the common bond of why we call ourselves American is to care for the men and women who wear the uniform and when they take off the uniform, we care for them when they are veterans.

name: Alice Paul

quote: It takes people a long time to learn the difference between talent and genius, especially ambitious young men and women.
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Only the most unapologetic biblical fundamentalists, for instance, take every biblical injunction literally. Jesus himself spoke out frequently against divorce in the strongest of terms.
name: Jon Meacham

quote: It's very hard for a woman in comedy. It's hard for women to be bold and not care what anyone, particularly men, think. Maybe that is why so many women comics are lesbians.

quote: The problem for those who assert biblical authority in support of traditional definitions of marriage is that one could, with equal validity, assert that the lending of money or certain kinds of haircuts are forbidden by God, or that slavery and the subjugation of women are authorized by the Lord.

quote: What people don't understand about Sarah Palin is that she is a rancher's wife. From Alberta down to Texas I've known women like that: good common sense, bright and vilified by city people.
